Header: School buildings vested with the students
Content: Several school buildings in Anuradhapura and Kurunegala were vested with the students under the nearest school best school concept. Vesting with the students of the three storied building of Welagedara Central College in Kurunegala, built at a cost of 15 million rupees took place under the patronage of Minister Akila Viraj Kariyawasam. The building is equipped with modern facilities including a library and a laboratory. State Minister Ashok Abeysinghe was present on the occasion. Meanwhile 3 new two storied buildings built at Anuradhapura Vivekananda Tamil School were vested with the students under the patronage of Minister Chandrani Bandara. The buildings are equipped with study resource centres, computer centres and modern laboratories. A sum of 40 million rupees has been spent on the constructions.
